mapper.insert: insert into board (pk, title, description, create_date, category) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{description}, sysdate, #{category})
insert into reply (board_pk, member_pk, content) values(#{board_pk}, #{member_pk}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where pk=#{pk}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,pk,title,description,image,good,bad,hit,create_date from (select * from board where category=#{category} order by create_date desc)) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1)*20+1) and rnum <= (#{page}*20)
select distinct name from tags where category=#{category}
select pk,title,create_date from (select rownum,pk,title, create_date from board where category=#{category} order by create_date desc) where rownum <= 10
select nickname,image,content,good,bad,r.create_date from reply r,member m where r.board_pk=#{pk} and r.member_pk=m.pk
